explanation: [0-0] The scene is set in a pixelated outdoor environment. On the left side of the screen, there is a pixelated cartoon character with a blue shirt and purple pants standing on a dark gray pixelated road. In front of him, on the road, lies a giant orange-framed pixelated mirror with a slightly distorted surface. Behind the mirror, there are pixelated gray buildings and a pixelated lawn.
[0-2] As the pixelated character in blue walks up to the pixelated mirror and waves, a reflection of a pixelated cartoon character wearing blue clothes and purple pants waving appears in the mirror.

[2-9] Following that, the camera moves to the right. As the pixelated cartoon character in blue jumps to the right, he arrives in front of a second pixelated mirror. The pixelated character in blue opens his arms, spreads his legs and looks at the mirror. However, in the mirror appears a pixelated cartoon character of a woman with yellow hair wearing green clothes. The pixelated cartoon character in blue strikes various poses in front of the mirror, and the yellow-haired female pixelated cartoon character in the mirror mimics his every move. During this time, many pixelated red hearts keep popping up from the pixelated cartoon character in blue.
